entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to a few rain showers or ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
